description: This notification signifies that the specified server has
changed state. The ServerName identifies the server, the
ServicePicName identifies the session-pic that originated this
notification and ServerState indicates whether server came up or went down.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerStatus JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServicePicName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerState s Up

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerStatus JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServicePicName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerState s Down

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerStatus JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServicePicName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerState s EXAMPLE

description: The name identifies an external server (charging,AAA,etc) on mobile-gateway.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerName

description: This identifies the session-pic, in the form ms-a/b/0, where
<a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServicePicName

description: This indicates whether the server status is Up or Down
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-EXAMPLE-MIB::jnxMobileGatewayExampleServerState
